dublin_core.dcvalue: This paper uses JPIP protocol to transmit and display high resolution medical images through the wireless network JPIP server extracts medical images from PACS system transforms the format of medical images and parses and recomposes the JPEG2000 codestream Wireless PDA access and display DICOM medical images through accessing the JPIP server
Zhongguo yi liao qi xie za zhi = Chinese journal of medical instrumentation
[JPIP-based wireless transmission and display of high resolution DICOM medical images].
